1.name: Intolerance: Love's Struggle Throughout the Ages
1.description: The story of a poor young woman, separated by prejudice from her husband and baby, is interwoven with tales of intolerance from throughout history.

2.name: The Blacklist
2.description: Based on the 1915 Colorado miners strike. Warren Harcourt, the coal company manager, comes to the scene. This causes a chain of events that will change the current status quo.

3.name: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
3.description: A French professor and his daughter accompany Captain Nemo on an adventure aboard a submarine.

4.name: A Daughter of the Gods
4.description: A sultan agrees to help an wicked witch destroy a mysterious young lady, if the witch will bring his young son back from the dead with magic.

5.name: Joan the Woman
5.description: A WWI English officer is inspired the night before a dangerous mission by a vision of Joan of Arc, whose story he relives.

6.name: De Voortrekkers
6.description: This feature film from 1916 tells the story of South Africa's Boer pioneers in their epic trek across southern Africa in search of new land. It concentrates on the struggle against Zulu ...                See full summary »

7.name: Judex
7.description: A twelve part serial following the adventures of the masked vigilante Judex as he fights against criminals led by the corrupt banker Favrauxom.

8.name: Shoes
8.description: A young working girl must suport her family on only five dollars a week. The strain of trying to feed, house and clothe her mother, her father and three brothers finally gets to be too much...                See full summary »

9.name: Maciste alpino
9.description: A soldier of near-superhuman strength fights battles in the First World War and wages a private war to rescue a young woman from the castle where she is imprisoned.

10.name: The Dumb Girl of Portici
10.description: Fenella, a poor Italian girl, falls in love with a Spanish nobleman, but their affair triggers a revolution and national catastrophe.

11.name: The Half-Breed
11.description: An outcast named Lo Dorman encounters a young woman lost in the woods. He defends her from danger in the forest and from Sheriff Dunn.

12.name: The Serpent
12.description: Peasant girl Vania is assaulted by a duke who murders her lover and sends her away to London. There she becomes a famous actress. The Duke, seeing her perform but not recognizing her, hears...                See full summary »

13.name: Where Are My Children?
13.description: A District Attorney's outspoken stand on abortion gets him in trouble with the local community.

14.name: Sherlock Holmes
14.description: When a couple of swindlers hold young Alice Faulkner against her will in order to discover the whereabouts of letters which could spell scandal for the royal family, Sherlock Holmes is on the case.

15.name: Snow White
15.description: Snow White is a motherless princess, who arouses the jealousy and hatred of Mary Jane, her mother's former lady-in-waiting, who is the ugliest woman in the kingdom, but aspires to the ...                See full summary »

16.name: Homunculus
16.description: A group of scientists, led by a Professor Ortmann, produce a living human child using scientific processes - a "homunculus." This creature is human in every way, except that he cannot experience love.

17.name: The Fall of a Nation
17.description: Three acts and a prologue. Act 1: A nation falls. Act 2: The heel of the conqueror. Act 3: The uprising two years later.

18.name: The Cossack Whip
18.description: Feodor Turov, chief of the Russian Czar's secret police, orders his Cossacks to attack a village he believes to be infested with rebels. The Cossacks attack the village and massacre almost ...                See full summary »

19.name: Homunculus, 1. Teil
19.description: Part of the artificial-creature series encompassing Der Golem (1914 and 1920), Alraune (1918, 1928, 1930) and Metropolis (1926), 'Homunculus' was the most popular serial in Germany during ...                See full summary »

20.name: The Aryan
20.description: Steve Denton, rich from years of prospecting, is fleeced by the citizens of Yellow Ridge. In his rage, he kidnaps the woman most responsible and makes her his slave in a desert hideaway. He...                See full summary »

21.name: Vingarne
21.description: An adaptation of Herman Bang's 1902 novel "Mikaël." A sculptor befriends a young painter who becomes his model. Their friendship is thrown into turmoil when they both fall in love with the same woman.

22.name: The Habit of Happiness
22.description: Sunny Wiggins is convinced that laughter can cure any ailment. He tries his thesis out on a dyspeptic millionaire, to great success. He turns his attention to easing the plight of the ...                See full summary »

23.name: War Brides
23.description: Joan is loved by a young man of the village and they are married. In a few weeks the husband, a soldier, is sent to the war-front along with his three brothers. Word is received that her ...                See full summary »

24.name: The Mysteries of Myra
24.description: Myra Maynard, is plagued by a wide variety of metaphysical assaults by the corrupt Black Order, a secret organization which uses magic, curses and any supernatural means possible to achieve its ends.

25.name: Sold for Marriage
25.description: A poor Russian girl's beauty leads her unscrupulous uncle to bring her to the United States. There he is going to sell her into a marriage with a rich old man she has never met. But her ...                See full summary »

26.name: Under Two Flags
26.description: Lewis Victor of the French Foreign Legion is actually Bertie Cecil, a British nobleman hiding from dishonour for a crime actually committed by his brother. He is loved by Cigarette, a camp ...                See full summary »

27.name: Lovely Mary
27.description: Mary Lane and her cousin Claiborne want to sell some land left to them by their family. Real-estate agent Roland Manning falls in love with her, and prepares a deal that will make money for...                See full summary »

28.name: Reggie Mixes In
28.description: Reggie, a wealthy young man about town, is eager for excitement, so he takes to visiting the rougher sections of the city in search of thrills. He meets and falls for a cabaret singer, but ...                See full summary »

29.name: The Girl Philippa
29.description: About the year 1900 in a midnight raid on the palace of a Balkan king, emissaries of a great power slay the royal pair, and carry off the infant crown princess. The time shifts to the ...                See full summary »

30.name: A Sister of Six
30.description: A young woman and her six little brothers and sisters are left orphans by the murder of their father over gold found on his ranch. Together the seven offspring fight against their greedy ...                See full summary »

31.name: Friday the 13th
31.description: When a judge is financially ruined by Peter Brownley, a Wall Street millionaire, his daughter seeks revenge by getting a job in the tycoon's office. She manages to discover information that...                See full summary »

32.name: Hell's Hinges
32.description: In the wayward western town known as Hell's Hinges, a local tough guy is reformed by the faith of a good woman.

33.name: Hævnens Nat
33.description: A criminal escapes from prison, however a betrayal leads to his second arrest.

34.name: The Eternal Sappho
34.description: From Alphonse Daudet's 1884 novel comes a variation: A scheme by a beautiful vamp to marry a wealthy young man fails, and the woman returns to her former lover, a sculptor. She is shocked ...                See full summary »

35.name: East Lynne
35.description: Miscasting of everybody's favorite vamp as the long-suffering Lady Isabel cast in a modern setting.

37.name: Less Than the Dust
37.description: Young Hindu woman Radha, becomes best friends with Captain Raymond Townsend during his service in India, but he soon goes back to England to tend to the estate of an uncle who has just died...                See full summary »

38.name: The Crimson Stain Mystery
38.description: In attempting to develop a chemical which would make a person super-intelligent, Dr. Montrose fails and the subjects of his experiments metamorphose into hideous monsters who band together ...                See full summary »

39.name: The Picture of Dorian Gray
39.description: A rake remains young while his portrait grows old.

40.name: Dödskyssen
40.description: Dr Monro is found dead in his home. Three people are testifying before the police about what happened.

41.name: La vie de Bohème
41.description: Orphaned Mimi ( Alice Brady ), is taken in by a drunken innkeeper and becomes a maid. She meets Rudolphe ( Paul Capellani ), heir of a upper class family, who rescues her from the unwanted ...                See full summary »

42.name: Oliver Twist
42.description: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

43.name: The Place Beyond the Winds
43.description: Priscilla Glenn is a product of the woods, a wild, impulsive, nature-loving child. Her father is her antithesis, seeing none of the beauties of nature, thinking women only creatures to be ...                See full summary »

45.name: The Good Bad Man
45.description: An outlaw calling himself Passin' Through halts his "evil" ways long enough to help out some children in difficulty.

46.name: The Children in the House
46.description: Roy Somerville has turned out a rather interesting story that will hold the interest of the majority of audiences as produced by the Triangle-Fine Arts Company. It is a five-reel feature ...                See full summary »

47.name: The Return of Draw Egan
47.description: Outlaw leader "Draw" Egan, believed dead, turns up in the town of Yellow Dog. The townsfolk believe him to be William Blake, a strong and law-abiding man. They appoint him sheriff to rid ...                See full summary »

49.name: The Americano
49.description: Doug is an American mining engineer. Pres. Valdez of Paragonia (Aitken) wants him to reopen the country's mines. Doug is not interested ... until he sees the President's beautiful daughter,...                See full summary »

50.name: Romeo and Juliet
50.description: Shakespeare's classic tale of ill-fated lovers whose deaths bring peace to their warring families.
